New Records: CJ McCollum tied a career-high with 50 points
Key Match Events: Pelicans won for just the second time in 22 games
CJ McCollum scored eight points as New Orleans began the third quarter with a 17-4 run
Pelicans scored the first six points of the game
CJ McCollum had eight in the first 3:33 of the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: CJ McCollum made 18 of 27 field-goal attempts, including 10 3-pointers on 16 attempts
Trey Murphy III added 17 points, Brandon Boston scored 13 off the bench and Yves Missi had 12 points and 11 rebounds as six Pelicans scored in double figures
Others: Jordan Poole scored 26, Alexandre Sarr had 19, Malcolm Brogdon added 16 and Kyle Kuzma tallied 14 to pace the Wizards
